attributes.action: not permit adoptions by single people or same-sex couples.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We support the right of all children to a balanced upbringing with a mother and a father, NOT two mothers and NOT two fathers.  For this reason we ask you please, not to permit adoptions by single people or same-sex couples.  The rights of the children outweigh the right of any government to peruse  misguided  ideologies of so-called “political correctness”.
